sentence.Network_en: He is cagey about what he was paid for the business.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对自己在这桩买卖中所得的报酬不愿多提。

sentence.Network_en: Tony is very cagey about his family.
sentence.Network_cn: 托尼对自己家的事讳莫如深。

sentence.Network_en: The cagey fox could not be easily trapped by the farmer.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只狡猾的狐狸不会轻易落入农夫的陷阱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: BBC English ... Dumped 被甩了 Cagey 回避 Bad Hair Day 心烦意乱.
cager 篮球选手cagey 小心的cagily 小心地
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... rowdy 吵闹的，粗暴的 cagey 谨慎的，机灵的 blarhey 奉承话.
bill of sale的意思中文翻译 ... cager rocker shaft 装罐用推车机的推杆 cagey 谨慎小心的, 精明的 cagily 谨慎小心地, 精明地.

list.abs: John is pretty cagey . You have to keep an eye on him ., 约翰很谨慎小心的 . 你必须留意他.
The six months of talks were cagey and difficult ., 六个月的对话是谨慎而艰难的.
the cagey fox could not be easily trapped by the farmer .那只狡猾的狐狸不会轻易落入农夫的陷阱。
a cagey lawyer ; too clever to be sound ., 精明的律师 ; 太狡猾了 , 不可靠.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent. (originally US): of unknown origin

entry.tran: 讳莫如深的;守口如瓶的
entry.def: If you say that someone is being cagey about something, you mean that you think they are deliberately not giving you much information or expressing an opinion about it.

example.ex: He is cagey about what he was paid for the business.
example.tran: 他对自己在这桩买卖中所得的报酬不愿多提。

means.word_mean: 1. showing self-interest and shrewdness in dealing with others;
2. characterized by great cautious and wariness;

sentences.sentence: "a cagey avoidance of a definite answer"

auth_sentence.content: He was still cagey about whether he had fired Compass.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was still cagey about whether he had fired Compass.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was still cagey about whether he had fired Compass.

auth_sentence.content: We are a better side than that; we were cagey.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are a better side than that; we were cagey.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are a better side than that; we were cagey.

auth_sentence.content: Juan Imhoff's try was the highlight of a cagey opening half on which neither side could stamp their authority.
auth_sentence.res_content: Juan Imhoff's try was the highlight of a cagey opening half on which neither side could stamp their authority.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Juan Imhoff's try was the highlight of a cagey opening half on which neither side could stamp their authority.

sentences.en: She’s very cagey about her past life.
sentences.cn: 她对自己过去的生活讳莫如深。

sentences.en: The cagey fox could not be easily trapped by the farmer.
sentences.cn: 那只狡猾的狐狸不会轻易落入农夫的陷阱。
